tto8UtiIdusXjApFN4-ifQ.text: This isn't a review. Deleting this one soon.

N42uQEhxS8WpIpX-F2M2FQ.text: Great chinese with a wide selection of food. Everything is always well cooked and reasonably priced. Try the lemon chicken as it is brilliant. Delivery is fast and all the people there are very nice. Open everyday apart from a tuesday and open to 12 oclock.

Tos3hGcTz02tgEBctgOrcA.text: this is my local chinese takeaway and in my opinion the best in edinburgh. we have never had a bad meal from here in 7year. shredded chicken chilli is delic and try the small rane of dim sum :0) fast delivery, great service and not badly priced
